Message:
A gravekeeper’s job is to
watch over the departed.
Ensuring they have
a peaceful rest is
all we can do.

I don’t think there’s
anything wrong with that.
I mean, can you imagine
someone dying,
only to be left all alone?

It’d be so sad if no one
watched over them.

But, that doesn’t mean
a gravekeeper should wait
around for someone to die.

After seeing the Duke save
one person after another,
I did some soul searching.

What is the job
of a gravekeeper?
And, as a gravekeeper,
what can I do for everyone?
